title: The Ash House
subtitle: Demo

media.alt: The Ash House - Horror Game Poster

description:
You are Jude, an investigative journalist trapped in the Ash House - a manor where time shattered during a forbidden ritual. Shift between three timelines (Past, Present, and Fractured Future) to solve inter-connected puzzles while evading the Ash Mother, an adaptive AI entity that learns from your every move.

Key Features:
- Triple-Timeline Gameplay: Alter the past to change the present and future
- Self-Learning Antagonist: The Ash Mother evolves with your playstyle
- Psychological Horror: Mind-bending puzzles and environmental storytelling
- Indian Horror Roots: Inspired by regional folklore and myths
- Multiple Endings: Your choices determine Jude's fate
shortDescription: A first-person horror where the house remembers - and hunts.
shortDescriptionUnderGallery: Survive the Ash House - a time-shifting nightmare with an AI that learns from your fear.
keyFeatures: Time-shifting mechanics across three distinct timelines
Lore-rich environment with deep narrative connections
developerNotes: From Snowman Studio: Our passion project blending psychological horror with innovative time-manipulation gameplay. Inspired by Indian folklore and classic survival horror.

items.title: The Past (1950s)
items.content: When the Ash House was active with cult rituals. Solve puzzles in this era to alter the present.

items.title: The Present (1990s)
items.content: The abandoned house where you begin your investigation. Boarded up and decaying.

items.title: Fractured Future
items.content: Reality is warped - hallways loop, gravity shifts, and the Ash Mother is at full power.

items.title: Adaptive AI Antagonist
items.content: The Ash Mother learns from your hiding spots and strategies, becoming more dangerous over time.

items.title: Time-Shifting Puzzles
items.content: Actions in one timeline permanently affect others. Burn a diary in the Past to open a path in the Present.

items.title: Sanity Mechanics
items.content: Extended exposure to the Fractured Future timeline causes visual and auditory hallucinations.
